channel.title: RSC Unlimited
channel.description:
Welcome to RSC Unlimited, the Runescape Classic Private Server
[url=http://www.rscunlimited.net][img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img][/url]
Website: [url=http://rscunlimited.net/]RSC Unlimited[/url] Webclient: [url=http://rscunlimited.net/play]Webclient[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.rscunlimited.net/download.php?c=Client_Download]Download Client[/url]
To play the game: 1. Register on Forums 2. Go to "My Characters" to create an in-game character 3. Download the client or go on the Webclient 4. Login and play
Exp rate: 20x (30x for subscribers)
Features:
* Base Source: DarkQuest by Peeter + large amount of bug fixes, improvements, enhancements, security updates * Double Click JAR Client / Webclient * 21 Fully working Quests (including 3 members quests) [These quests are down to perfection of replication of original RSC] * Perfected Tutorial Island scripting (Starting location for new players) + ability to skip * 4 Different Client Sizes (Small, Medium, Big, Huge) * Drop rates + Items calculated to minimize inflation (extremely similar to original RSC's with some minor adjustments) * Fully working Runecrafting skill + essence mine * Fully working Agility skill * Fully working Dwarf Multi Cannon * Minigames! (Last Man Standing, CTF, Hide n Seek, Tournaments, Global War, Holiday Drops, Quiz, World Drop, Nazi Zombies) * Absolutely ALL dupe methods have been fixed * Party / Clan system (GUI/GFX enabled) * Bot detection * IRC [irc.rizon.net - #rscu] * Arcade * Many more aspects to the website / server (I will construct a full list later)
In-Game Screenies:
Adjustable Screen Size: (Huge shown) [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Tutorial Island: (use ::skiptututorial if you wish to skip it) [IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Agility: [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Rune Essence Mine: (For Runecrafting skill) [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1294/screenshot20130131at935.png[/img]
Smithing GUI: [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/4176/screenshot20130131at933.png[/img]
Spirit Tree Teleport System [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot0.png[/img]
DM (DeathMatch Arena) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot1.png[/img]
KBD Intelligence [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot3.png[/img]
Quests: (Lost City shown) [IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
RSC Sleep System: [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91321_pm.png[/img]
Absolutely F2P ONLY Wilderness (includes spells, equipment, food, boosts, etc) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92826_pm.png[/img]
Enhanced Sprites Toggle (Optional) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_93255_pm.png[/img] [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot5.png[/img]
Skill Interface (All skills are batched + Runecrafting skill) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92208_pm.png[/img]
Quest Interface (23 Fully replicated RSC quests with exact dialogues) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91903_pm.png[/img]
Info Interface [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91915_pm.png[/img]
IRC Chatroom [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92350_pm.png[/img]
Fully Automated Donation System [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92422_pm.png[/img]
Highscores [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92449_pm.png[/img]
Item Database [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92522_pm.png[/img]
Npc Database [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92537_pm.png[/img]
Skill Database (Herblaw shown) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92612_pm.png[/img]
Note: This project used to be named RSC Revamped, but does not rely on the old source

item.title: RSC Unlimited
item.dc:creator: @iBoss iBoss
item.description:
@iBoss wrote:

Tried it and horrible server. Clearly made to make $ out of people. You should go on rs2 instead. More fish to bait. Tried few f2p quests and they are massively buggy.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited
item.dc:creator: @sklem sklem
item.description:
@sklem wrote:

Cool, 10k+ members, must be the best one out there now.

The most populated server will always be the one that is most enjoyable.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

Welcome to RSC Unlimited, the Runescape Classic Private Server

Website: RSC Unlimited
Webclient: Webclient
Client Download: Download Client

To play the game:

  1. Register on Forums
  2. Go to “My Characters” to create an in-game character
  3. Download the client or go on the Webclient
  4. Login and play

Exp rate: 20x (30x for subscribers)

Features:

  • Base Source: DarkQuest by Peeter + large amount of bug fixes, improvements, enhancements, security updates
  • Double Click JAR Client / Webclient
  • 21 Fully working Quests (including 3 members quests) [These quests are down to perfection of replication of original RSC]
  • Perfected Tutorial Island scripting (Starting location for new players) + ability to skip
  • 4 Different Client Sizes (Small, Medium, Big, Huge)
  • Drop rates + Items calculated to minimize inflation (extremely similar to original RSC’s with some minor adjustments)
  • Fully working Runecrafting skill + essence mine
  • Fully working Agility skill
  • Fully working Dwarf Multi Cannon
  • Minigames! (Last Man Standing, CTF, Hide n Seek, Tournaments, Global War, Holiday Drops, Quiz, World Drop, Nazi Zombies)
  • Absolutely ALL dupe methods have been fixed
  • Party / Clan system (GUI/GFX enabled)
  • Bot detection
  • IRC [irc.rizon.net - #rscu]
  • Arcade
  • Many more aspects to the website / server (I will construct a full list later)
